MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the DG8 postcode area of Newton Stewart. This is causing flickering power and loss of supply to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.10am. Our engineers are on their way to the local area to investigate and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 11.15am. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.18am on the 30th of November 2020.
